description: Once a king who craved more and more power. In his greed, he made deals with beings of unparalleled cruelty. Now, driven by hatred for all mortals and his own immortality, he roams from battle to battle, seeking to destroy everything. Forever searching for a way to finally end his own existence.
taunt_1: All life finds its end through me.
taunt_2: I will harvest you like all the others.
taunt_3: I will split you! Hack and smash you!
taunt_4: I will kill you! Over and over again!
anger_2: Come and challenge me, mortals! I am here!
nervous_1: You think you can kill me?
victory_1: You dare face me? I will show you hell on Earth!
victory_4: What a cowardly creature, so bothersome.
ally_death: This is the silence I crave.
congrats: Only in death can you hear me sing.
boast: Always toward death... If only it were my own.
help: They will suffer for imprisoning me!
extra: Take everything from them! Become the World Destroyer!
siege: My army is ready; soon we will own another castle.
no_attack_1: I don't need to demonstrate my superiority, it's obvious.
no_attack_2: Only a fool would approve of such a strategy.
team_winning: Every dream is a candle I must extinguish. I am the darkness.
team_losing: They see me in chains, defeated. But I do not bow, this massacre is noble.
will_attack: These primitives worship me and hope for mercy. I will grant them death.
